channel.title: Tut on getting easy Money!
channel.description:
Ok well I thought about it and was so bored I went to my friends site about Rs and all that junk.. Well people were complaining about how they need people to sell Pins, I just wrote a tut up in my own words, I wanted to get some referrals too so I sent them my link to register under me. Now what this will do is make your life easier if your like say 12 - 14 and want to do something that will get you great cash. Heres the place to go. It's called AWs Surveys, you should start off with a 30$ budget after you get done with the surveys. Each person you have referr under your link and register an account will gain you apox. 1.25$ which adds up in time. This is no scam and is 100% free.
Things you should do before cashing in: -Get a paypal account -Referr for me -Make sure you got friends that will referr for you -Read the Terms of Service so you know what your doing.
Do not rep me because I don't need it ;) I am a first time poster on Moparisbest, but 75rep + 100+ posts on Rs2 Private servers part of Mopar.
Here are pics and links
[img]http://i237.photobucket.com/albums/ff78/0k0wn3d/money1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i237.photobucket.com/albums/ff78/0k0wn3d/money2.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.AWSurveys.com/homemain.cfm?refid=John991114]This will help me out and it'll link you to the site.[/url]
Instead of rep I suggest the above.... I perferr real money lol. It doesnt cost you a penny.
[url=http://www.AWSurveys.com/]This is just a plain Register[/url]
This will get you to the site but you won't benefit me at all.
Trst me it'll get you farther than mowing lawn for your neighbors. All it takes is friends, and half a brain. <3 -John

item.title: Tut on getting easy Money!
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Lol I posted the box of dollars thing on GzP and I had 56 referrals and over $500, and they still didn’t pay me. I only made $5 of that $500 rest was from everyone else… so you can just tell by that its fake.

Read full topic

item.title: Tut on getting easy Money!
item.dc:creator: @lordslayer565 lordslayer565
item.description:
@lordslayer565 wrote:

Scartastic:

I Box of dollars payed me 50$ before Adbux is awesome cause you get the money from your refferals earnings

Really? I got $50 on Box of Dollars requested payout and they never payed me.

Read full topic

item.title: Tut on getting easy Money!
item.dc:creator: @Scartastic Scartastic
item.description:
@Scartastic wrote:

Its a scam. I got 75$ on it, and I still havent gotten my money. I dont think I even will. I reccomend AdBux or BoxOfDollars. Box of dollars payed me 50$ before Adbux is awesome cause you get the money from your refferals earnings

Read full topic

item.title: Tut on getting easy Money!
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Post a picture of your paypal account with the money on it and i will try it out… otherwise it is a scam. trust me i did this before and spent like 5 hours clicking on adds to find out if you request the money they ban you. you can only use the adds to buy adds to put on your site.

edit: also you talk about rep alot… people here dont give a shit about rep… or postcount. only the quality of the post matters…

Read full topic

item.title: Tut on getting easy Money!
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

Sorry my bad mate. No need to flame I didn’t understand you right. Also my paypal has 0$ in it, I haven’t taken the money from the site yet because I need to get 75$. Those pics should show enough until I can get the money. If you I must I’ll get my friend to get a pic of his paypal with the money…

Read full topic

item.title: Tut on getting easy Money!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote="[-J O H N-"]link=topic=220779.msg1911723#msg1911723 date=1196671908]
Ahhh, where’d you get that quote, I don’t recall saying that, sound’n like my mother now lol. She tries to remember what I say and say it exactly like i did but always wrong. But honestly it’s true. It does make me money but it make you money too I’m linking you to a site most people take for granite when it’s pretty profitable. They make like 100 times more and you get a little cut outta it :p[/quote]

Wow, before you start making judgments, at least attempt to understand what I mean, dipshit. I’m saying that the quote above would be completely acceptable. Just stop posting here, and have this topic locked until you have a screenshot of your paypal account with the money in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Tut on getting easy Money!
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

Uhg trust me this is no scamm. Its been posted alot over Rune-Server, and I’v seen it on plenty of sites. They make money, you make money. I know my friend got 150$ from it… He just checks on it once a month and does surveys then once his cash stacks up, he gets it takin to his paypal.

Read full topic

These are all scams, any online free money shit are scams. I paid over 50 in offers and earned like 150 and i got 0 and i’ve been waiting for the money almost a year and a half.
